segments.text: would you like to learn to tango Donar ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: i am offering you my services . for your church . what do you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: i think i'll be a little afraid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no mistakes in a tango Donar.not like life , simple , that will make the tango so great . if you make a mistake , you'll get all tango done . just tango along . why don't you try ? will you try it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: all right . i'll give it a try .
segments.speaker: S2
